short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplest way to craft & share events for pretty much anything. Move is a fast, beautiful, fun way to share events in your community.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the Move Chrome extension, access quick links associated with your account by simply clicking the Move icon. This allows you to return to Move whenever needed, without having to navigate to the URL. 

Move replaces the controlling, complicated, and expensive platforms with a simplistic, modern, all-in-one tool. With clever features that allow you to manage your events in unique ways, Move is a fresh approach to connect with your community.
